Returns images of specified size
Returns image of a type
Returns black and white, grayscale, transparent, or color images
Returns images of a specific dominant color
Language to search google in. Defualt is 'English'
Sets the user interface language
Country to search from in google
Country to search for in google
Whether to show explicit results.
Return results in specific order
Name of the json file to store search result
Name of the env file that contains Google Search API and CX Keys
